price: 91. Mengapa baru sekarang (kamu beriman), padahal sesungguhnya engkau telah durhaka sejak dahulu, dan engkau termasuk orang yang berbuat kerusakan.
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
